javadoc.text: * Base interface implemented by all statistics.
* Returns the result of evaluating the statistic over the input array.
javadoc.return: the value of the statistic applied to the input array

javadoc.text: * Returns the result of evaluating the statistic over the specified entries * in the input array.
javadoc.param: begin the index of the first element to include
length the number of elements to include
javadoc.return: the value of the statistic applied to the included array entries
javadoc.throws: MathIllegalArgumentException if values is null or the indices are invalid

javadoc.text: * Returns a copy of the statistic with the same internal state.
